instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00840: What is 820-00840? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A - <SIGNAL>PPVCCCPU_S0G</SIGNAL>
threads.message:
Here is the issue:
I have all the rails...
After 5 sec the <SIGNAL>PPVCCCPU_S0G</SIGNAL> 0.947 drop to zero.
The CPU gets hot, but no USB or VIDEO activity. 
I already re-program the bios, replace from a good board and nothing work.

Any hint at this point?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00840</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A - <SIGNAL>PPVCCCPU_S0G</SIGNAL>
threads.message:
Should be CPU issue.
Its VCORE seems to drop just when starts to work; it should drop to 0.7V aprox instead.

Any history available?
